Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays congestion following an earlier door problem at Logan Square. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays congestion following an earlier door problem at Logan Square.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
